results.definition: powerlessness revealed by an inability to act
examples: in spite of their weakness the group remains active

results.definition: a penchant for something even though it might not be good for you
examples: he has a weakness for chocolate

results.definition: the condition of being financially weak
examples: the weakness of the dollar against the yen

results.definition: the property of lacking physical or mental strength; liability to failure under pressure or stress or strain
examples: his weakness increased as he became older
the weakness of the span was overlooked until it collapsed
